hero.title: Build tailored AI assistants for your organization
hero.subtitle: The Next Wilson platform creates custom AI assistants based on your needs. Our experts handle the technical configuration while you focus on your business.

metadata.title: The Next Wilson - AI Assistants
metadata.description: Bringing AI assistants to all organizations with a human touch

hero.title: Trust Center
hero.subtitle: Our commitment to security, privacy, and compliance as an EU-based AI solutions provider

intro.title: Building Trust in AI Solutions
intro.description: At The Next Wilson, we understand that trust is the foundation of any successful AI implementation. As an EU-based provider of AI-driven automation solutions, we are committed to upholding the highest standards of data protection, security, and ethical AI use.
intro.commitment: Our Trust Center serves as a comprehensive framework for how we approach compliance and security in our products and services, ensuring that all stakeholders can rely on our solutions with complete confidence.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.description: We fully comply with the General Data Protection Regulation, ensuring that all personal data is processed lawfully, fairly, and transparently.

points.dataMinimization: Data minimization principles applied to all processing
points.consent: Clear consent mechanisms and legal basis for all data processing
points.rights: Support for all data subject rights (access, rectification, erasure)

security.title: Data Security
security.description: Our multi-layered security approach protects your data at every stage of processing.

points.encryption: End-to-end encryption for data in transit and at rest
points.access: Role-based access controls and principle of least privilege
points.testing: Regular penetration testing and security audits

ethics.title: AI Ethics & Governance
ethics.description: We develop and deploy AI systems that adhere to ethical principles and governance standards.

points.fairness: Fairness and bias mitigation in AI systems
points.humancentric: Human-centric design with appropriate human oversight

aiAct.title: EU AI Act Readiness
aiAct.description: We are prepared for compliance with the upcoming EU AI Act regulations.

points.documentation: Thorough technical documentation of AI systems
points.transparency: Transparency requirements for high-risk AI systems
points.governance: Strong governance framework for AI development

dataResidency.title: EU Data Residency
dataResidency.description: We ensure that your data remains within EU jurisdiction with strong sovereignty protections.

points.euHosting: All production infrastructure hosted within the EU
points.sovereignty: EU data sovereignty guaranteed by design
points.locality: Local processing options available for sensitive workloads

certifications.title: Certifications & Compliance
certifications.description: We maintain industry-standard certifications to demonstrate our commitment to security and compliance.

points.iso27001: ISO 27001 certified information security management system
points.privacy: EU Cloud Code of Conduct adherence

commitment.title: Our Ongoing Commitment
commitment.description: Building trust is an ongoing process. We continuously improve our practices and maintain an open dialogue with our customers about security and compliance.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We provide clear documentation about how our services work, what data is collected, and how it is used.

privacy.title: Privacy by Design
privacy.description: Privacy considerations are integrated into every phase of our development process.

documentation.title: Comprehensive Documentation
documentation.description: Detailed compliance documentation is available to customers to support their own compliance needs.

contact.title: Contact Our Trust Team
contact.description: Have questions about our security practices, compliance, or data handling? Our Trust team is here to help.

footer.about: Specialized AI assistants for various sectors, built with a human touch.

notFound.subtitle: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you are trying to access does not exist or has been moved.

organizations.title: Choose your organization type
organizations.description: We offer specialized AI assistants for various organization types. Select yours to see relevant options and templates.

features.title: Why choose The Next Wilson?
features.description: Our platform offers unique benefits that set us apart from generic AI solutions.

deployment.title: Rapid deployment
deployment.description: Get up and running quickly with pre-built templates tailored to your organization type.

security.title: Privacy & security
security.description: Your data stays yours with our robust privacy controls and secure hosting options.

design.title: Human-centered design
design.description: AI assistants that feel approachable and helpful, creating positive user experiences.

tailored.title: Tailored solutions without the technical hassle
tailored.description: Tell us your preferences through our simple wizard, and our team will handle all the technical implementation for you.

benefits.experts: Expert-configured AI solutions based on your needs
benefits.integration: Seamless integration with your existing systems
benefits.support: Ongoing support and optimizations from our team

testimonials.title: What our customers say
testimonials.description: Read testimonials from organizations that have already implemented our AI assistants.

items.quote: The Next Wilson transformed how we interact with customers. The AI assistant handles routine inquiries 24/7, freeing our staff to focus on complex issues.
items.author: Sarah Johnson

items.quote: Implementation was seamless and quick. Within days, we had a fully functional assistant that understood our business processes.
items.author: Michael Chen

items.quote: The customization options are impressive. Our assistant feels like a natural extension of our brand and company culture.
items.author: Emily Rodriguez

video.title: See our AI assistants in action
video.description: Watch how our AI assistants are helping organizations improve their customer service and operations.

intake.title: How our intake process works
intake.description: Starting with The Next Wilson is simple and streamlined.

steps.title: Select your organization type
steps.description: Choose from our specialized templates designed for different industries and use cases.

steps.title: Share your preferences
steps.description: Tell us about your specific needs through our user-friendly wizard.

steps.title: Our team configures your assistant
steps.description: Our experts handle all technical aspects based on your requirements.

steps.title: Deploy and refine
steps.description: Launch your assistant and continuously improve it with our ongoing support.

hotel.name: Hotel
hotel.description: AI assistants for hotels to enhance guest experience and streamline daily operations.

municipality.name: Municipality
municipality.description: AI solutions for municipalities to improve citizen services and streamline administrative processes.

legal.name: Law Firm
legal.description: AI assistants for law firms to automate document processing and enhance client service.

healthcare.name: General Practice
healthcare.description: AI assistants for general practitioners to enhance patient care and optimize administrative workflows.

accountant.name: Accounting Firm
accountant.description: AI assistants for accounting firms to streamline financial administration, improve compliance, and optimize client service.

rental.name: Rental Business
rental.description: Rental of equipment, vehicles, or real estate
benefits: Automate the reservation process and manage availability
Increase occupancy rates through more efficient allocation
Reduce operational costs through automated workflows

hotel-concierge.name: Reception Assistant
hotel-concierge.description: A 24/7 reception assistant that answers guest questions, handles requests, and improves guest satisfaction
benefits: Reduces front desk workload by up to 40%

hotel-booking.name: Reservation Assistant
hotel-booking.description: Streamline the booking process, upsell rooms and services, and optimize occupancy rates
benefits: Integrates with your existing booking system
Increases direct bookings by up to 25%

hotel-upsell.name: Hotel Sales Assistant
hotel-upsell.description: Intelligently recommend additional services and experiences to guests before and during their stay
benefits: Personalizes recommendations based on guest profiles
Promotes in-house services and local experiences
Integrates with your POS and booking systems
Boosts ancillary revenue by up to 35%

citizen-assistant.name: Citizen Information Assistant
citizen-assistant.description: Help citizens navigate municipal services, answer questions, and guide through procedures
benefits: Reduces call center volume by up to 45%

permit-assistant.name: Permit Processing Assistant
permit-assistant.description: Guide citizens through permit applications, reducing errors and processing time
benefits: Reduces application errors by up to 60%

legal-intake.name: Legal Intake Assistant
legal-intake.description: Streamline the client intake process, gather relevant information, and schedule appointments
benefits: Reduces administrative workload by up to 35%
Improves client experience from first contact

clinical-support.name: Medical Support Assistant
clinical-support.description: Assists healthcare providers with clinical decision support, medical reference, and documentation
benefits: Quick medical reference and drug information

patient-engagement.name: Patient Communication Assistant
patient-engagement.description: Enhances patient communication, education, and follow-up to improve care outcomes

tax-assistant.name: Tax Filing Assistant
tax-assistant.description: Helps prepare and verify tax filings, identifies optimization opportunities, and ensures compliance
benefits: Automates collection of relevant financial data
Verifies filings for errors and inconsistencies
Keeps track of changes in tax legislation
Reduces preparation time by up to 40%

bookkeeping-assistant.name: Bookkeeping Assistant
bookkeeping-assistant.description: Streamlines accounting processes, automates data entry and reconciliation, and generates financial reports
benefits: Automates invoice processing and data entry

client-advisor.name: Client Advisory Assistant
client-advisor.description: Provides proactive financial advice to clients based on their current financial situation and business goals
benefits: Analyzes financial data for personalized advice
Flags cash flow issues before they arise
Generates scenario analysis for decision making

financial-admin.name: Financial Administration Assistant
financial-admin.description: Streamlines financial document processing, bookkeeping, and compliance reporting
benefits: Automated document processing and data extraction
Reduced manual errors by up to 95%
Saves up to 15 hours per week on administrative tasks

tax-advisor.name: Tax Advisory Assistant
tax-advisor.description: Provides tax optimization strategies and keeps track of regulatory changes
benefits: Up to 30% reduction in tax preparation time

financial-analyst.name: Financial Analysis Assistant
financial-analyst.description: Analyzes financial data to provide insights and forecasts for client businesses

reservation-assistant.name: Reservation Assistant
reservation-assistant.description: Automates the reservation process, optimizes availability, and improves customer satisfaction
benefits: Smart resource allocation for optimal occupancy
Automatic confirmations and reminders for customers
Seamless integration with your existing booking system

inventory-assistant.name: Inventory Management Assistant
inventory-assistant.description: Tracks your rental inventory, schedules maintenance, and optimizes asset lifecycle
benefits: Real-time visibility of all rentable items
Optimization of asset usage and lifespan
Detailed reporting on performance per item
Predictive analytics for peak periods and purchases

customer-service-assistant.name: Customer Service Assistant
customer-service-assistant.description: Provides 24/7 support for your renters, answers questions, and resolves issues
benefits: Immediate answers to frequently asked questions
Issue reporting and escalation when needed
Personalization based on customer history and preferences

intakeProcess.welcomeDescription: Answer a few questions to help us understand your needs and configure your ideal AI assistant.
intakeProcess.goalsDescription: Tell us what you want to achieve with your AI assistant
intakeProcess.userContextDescription: Tell us who will be using the assistant
intakeProcess.integrationsDescription: Tell us which systems you want to integrate with
intakeProcess.workStep1: You answer a few simple questions about your needs
intakeProcess.workStep2: Our team configures the assistant based on your answers
intakeProcess.workStep3: You get a perfect assistant ready to use
intakeProcess.goalsHelp: Describe the main objectives you want to achieve with this AI assistant
intakeProcess.goalsPlaceholder: E.g. we want to provide 24/7 customer service, automate administrative tasks...
intakeProcess.usersHelp: Describe the users who will interact with the assistant
intakeProcess.usersPlaceholder: E.g. customer service agents, managers, customers...
intakeProcess.integrationsHelp: List the systems you want to connect to the assistant
intakeProcess.integrationsPlaceholder: E.g. CRM system, knowledge information, internal databases...
intakeProcess.confirmInfoHelp: Please review the information below and make sure everything is correct

thankYou.title: Thank you!
thankYou.description: Your request has been received. Our team will start working on your custom AI assistant configuration.
thankYou.techConfigDesc: Our engineers will configure the assistant based on your requirements and prepare the system for integration.
thankYou.setupIntegDesc: We'll work with you to integrate the assistant with your existing systems and ensure smooth data flow.
thankYou.reviewApprovalDesc: You'll get a chance to review and test the assistant before it goes live, ensuring it meets your expectations.
thankYou.deployTrainDesc: Once approved, we'll deploy the assistant and provide training for your team to ensure successful adoption.
thankYou.contactInfo: We'll contact you soon with more details. If you have any questions in the meantime, please email us at support@thenextwilson.com

assistantDetail.interestedDesc: Contact us for more information or a demonstration of this AI assistant.

wizard.startWizardDesc: Let us help you find the right AI assistant for your needs. Start the process in just a few clicks.
wizard.noAssistantsAvailable: No assistants available yet for this organization type. Please check back later or contact us for a custom solution.

chat.welcome: Hello, I'm Wilson, your AI assistant. How can I help you today?
